DOC.criteria: Subjects must clinically document diagnosis agerelated cataract . Subjects must clear intraocular medium cataract . Subjects must undergo primary inthebag intraocular lens implantation correction aphakia follow continuous curvilinear anterior capsulotomy phacoemulsification cataract extraction .
